flawed_nl_solution:
Charles drew 6 + 6 = <<6+6=12>>12 pictures.
He has 20 - 12 = <<20-12=7>>7 papers left.
So Charles drew when he came back from work 7 - 2 = <<7-2=5>>5 pictures.
#### 5

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 8, not 7. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
